Content: Ship modules should connect to corridors on one side (This also means
they just need one or multiple supply ports in one direction, while to
corridors connect them in 3d). These corridors should serf as a buffer,
so the ship modules can be attached to each other as blocks. On the
none corridor sides the material might be armor or scaffolding like (if
viewed in the ship editor) mechanicaly the modules become boxes, so
they fit together without gaps or other odd stuff.
